Text:
Actually I just got banned from the Nexus website because of this torrent.

And we can say it is my fault because I created forum thread there about this package. Otherwise they would never know. My only idea was just to save the download time for each mod individually.

And of course the admin could have just warned me and I could stop seeding this torrent so no one would have it finished.. but I guess they're too cool for that.

So yeah .. I will seed as much as I can.
the nexus guys are dicks. i got banned myself simply for mocking a dragon age nude mod.
